specificItems.name: Dorohedoro, Vol. 15 and above
specificItems.blurb: I have volumes 1-14, but there are 20-something in total so I'd like more of them.

specificItems.name: Berserk Deluxe, Vol. 3 and above
specificItems.blurb: I have the first one and the second one on order. I'd like to own them all eventually and there's quite a few.

specificItems.name: Oak Cliff Coffee Subscription
specificItems.blurb: I would love a coffee subscription from Oak Cliff. I tried a different brand recently but think I like this one more. You can pre-pay for a few shipments so something like the "Roaster's Choice" at the minimum length is fine.

specificItems.name: rOtring 600 Ballpoint Pen Medium Point, Black Ink, Black Barrel
specificItems.blurb: I have one of these but it's a bit beat up and would like a replacement. I normally take it with me in my backpack when working at the office. I also can't find it at the moment...

specificItems.name: rOtring 600 0.5mm Silver Barrel Mechanical Pencil
specificItems.blurb: I like the pen I have and would like a pencil of the same sort. Silver color so I can easily distinguish between the two though.

specificItems.name: YAESU VX-6R Hand Held FM Transceiver
specificItems.blurb: Low priority. A handheld transceiver radio I've had my eyes on.

specificItems.name: Money for PC upgrade
specificItems.blurb: I'd like to do an upgrade for my desktop computer. It will take me about $1,000 to get it to where I want it. Any cash gifts would be fine.
